Event.name: JavaMonitorWait
Event.label: Java Monitor Wait
Event.description: Waiting on a Java monitor

Field.name: monitorClass
Field.label: Monitor Class
Field.description: Class of object waited on

Field.name: notifier
Field.label: Notifier Thread
Field.description: Notifying Thread

Field.name: timeout
Field.label: Timeout
Field.description: Maximum wait time

Field.name: timedOut
Field.label: Timed Out
Field.description: Wait has been timed out

Field.name: address
Field.label: Monitor Address
Field.description: Address of object waited on

Field.name: cause
Field.label: Monitor Inflation Cause
Field.description: Cause of inflation

Event.name: ReservedStackActivation
Event.label: Reserved Stack Activation
Event.description: Activation of Reserved Stack Area caused by stack overflow with ReservedStackAccess annotated method in call stack

Field.name: classModificationCount
Field.label: Class Modification Count
Field.description: The number of times the class has changed

Field.name: start
Field.label: Start Address
Field.description: Start address of the virtual space

Field.name: committedEnd
Field.label: Committed End Address
Field.description: End address of the committed memory for the virtual space

Field.name: committedSize
Field.label: Committed Size
Field.description: Size of the committed memory for the virtual space

Field.name: reservedEnd
Field.label: Reserved End Address
Field.description: End address of the reserved memory for the virtual space

Field.name: reservedSize
Field.label: Reserved Size
Field.description: Size of the reserved memory for the virtual space

Field.name: start
Field.label: Start Address
Field.description: Start address of the space

Field.name: end
Field.label: End Address
Field.description: End address of the space

Field.name: used
Field.label: Used
Field.description: Bytes allocated by objects in the space

Field.name: size
Field.label: Size
Field.description: Size of the space

Field.name: heapUsed
Field.label: Heap Used
Field.description: Bytes allocated by objects in the heap

Field.name: committed
Field.label: Committed
Field.description: Committed memory for this space

Field.name: used
Field.label: Used
Field.description: Bytes allocated by objects in the space

Field.name: reserved
Field.label: Reserved
Field.description: Reserved memory for this space

Event.name: GarbageCollection
Event.label: Garbage Collection
Event.description: Garbage collection performed by the JVM

Field.name: name
Field.label: Name
Field.description: The name of the Garbage Collector

Field.name: cause
Field.label: Cause
Field.description: The reason for triggering this Garbage Collection

Field.name: sumOfPauses
Field.label: Sum of Pauses
Field.description: Sum of all the times in which Java execution was paused during the garbage collection

Field.name: longestPause
Field.label: Longest Pause
Field.description: Longest individual pause during the garbage collection

Event.name: ParallelOldGarbageCollection
Event.label: Parallel Old Garbage Collection
Event.description: Extra information specific to Parallel Old Garbage Collections

Field.name: densePrefix
Field.label: Dense Prefix
Field.description: The address of the dense prefix, used when compacting

Event.name: YoungGarbageCollection
Event.label: Young Garbage Collection
Event.description: Extra information specific to Young Garbage Collections

Event.name: OldGarbageCollection
Event.label: Old Garbage Collection
Event.description: Extra information specific to Old Garbage Collections

Event.name: G1GarbageCollection
Event.label: G1 Young Garbage Collection
Event.description: Extra information specific to G1 Young Garbage Collections

Field.name: timeSlice
Field.label: Time Slice
Field.description: Time slice used to calculate MMU

Field.name: gcTime
Field.label: GC Time
Field.description: Time stopped because of GC during last time slice

Field.name: pauseTarget
Field.label: Pause Target
Field.description: Max time allowed to be spent on GC during last time slice

Field.name: cSetUsedBefore
Field.label: Collection Set Before
Field.description: Memory usage before GC in the collection set regions

Field.name: cSetUsedAfter
Field.label: Collection Set After
Field.description: Memory usage after GC in the collection set regions

Field.name: allocationRegions
Field.label: Allocation Regions
Field.description: Regions chosen as allocation regions during evacuation (includes survivors and old space regions)

Field.name: allocationRegionsUsedBefore
Field.label: Allocation Regions Before
Field.description: Memory usage before GC in allocation regions

Field.name: allocationRegionsUsedAfter
Field.label: Allocation Regions After
Field.description: Memory usage after GC in allocation regions

Event.name: GCReferenceStatistics
Event.label: GC Reference Statistics
Event.description: Total count of processed references during GC

Field.name: allocated
Field.label: Allocated
Field.description: Total memory allocated by PLABs

Field.name: wasted
Field.label: Wasted
Field.description: Total memory wasted within PLABs due to alignment or refill

Field.name: used
Field.label: Used
Field.description: Total memory occupied by objects within PLABs

Field.name: undoWaste
Field.label: Undo Wasted
Field.description: Total memory wasted due to allocation undo within PLABs

Field.name: regionEndWaste
Field.label: Region End Wasted
Field.description: Total memory wasted at the end of regions due to refill

Field.name: regionsRefilled
Field.label: Region Refills
Field.description: Total memory wasted at the end of regions due to refill

Field.name: directAllocated
Field.label: Allocated (direct)
Field.description: Total memory allocated using direct allocation outside of PLABs

Field.name: failureUsed
Field.label: Used (failure)
Field.description: Total memory occupied by objects in regions where evacuation failed

Field.name: failureWaste
Field.label: Wasted (failure)
Field.description: Total memory left unused in regions where evacuation failed

Event.name: G1EvacuationYoungStatistics
Event.label: G1 Evacuation Statistics for Young
Event.description: Memory related evacuation statistics during GC for the young generation

Event.name: G1EvacuationOldStatistics
Event.label: G1 Evacuation Memory Statistics for Old
Event.description: Memory related evacuation statistics during GC for the old generation

Event.name: G1BasicIHOP
Event.label: G1 Basic IHOP Statistics
Event.description: Basic statistics related to current IHOP calculation

Field.name: threshold
Field.label: Current IHOP Threshold
Field.description: Current IHOP threshold

Field.name: thresholdPercentage
Field.label: Current IHOP Threshold
Field.description: Current IHOP threshold in percent of old generation

Field.name: targetOccupancy
Field.label: Target Occupancy
Field.description: Target old generation occupancy to reach at the start of mixed GC

Field.name: currentOccupancy
Field.label: Current Occupancy
Field.description: Current old generation occupancy

Field.name: recentMutatorAllocationSize
Field.label: Recent Mutator Allocation Size
Field.description: Mutator allocation during mutator operation in the most recent interval

Field.name: recentMutatorDuration
Field.label: Recent Mutator Duration
Field.description: Time the mutator ran in the most recent interval

Field.name: recentAllocationRate
Field.label: Recent Allocation Rate
Field.description: Allocation rate of the mutator in the most recent interval in bytes/second

Field.name: lastMarkingDuration
Field.label: Last Marking Duration
Field.description: Last time from the end of the last concurrent start to the first mixed GC

Event.name: G1AdaptiveIHOP
Event.label: G1 Adaptive IHOP Statistics
Event.description: Statistics related to current adaptive IHOP calculation

Field.name: threshold
Field.label: Threshold
Field.description: Current IHOP Threshold

Field.name: thresholdPercentage
Field.label: Threshold
Field.description: Current IHOP threshold in percent of the internal target occupancy

Field.name: ihopTargetOccupancy
Field.label: IHOP Target Occupancy
Field.description: Internal target old generation occupancy to reach at the start of mixed GC

Field.name: currentOccupancy
Field.label: Current Occupancy
Field.description: Current old generation occupancy

Field.name: additionalBufferSize
Field.label: Additional Buffer
Field.description: Additional buffer size

Field.name: predictedAllocationRate
Field.label: Predicted Allocation Rate
Field.description: Current predicted allocation rate for the mutator in bytes/second

Field.name: predictedMarkingDuration
Field.label: Predicted Marking Duration
Field.description: Current predicted time from the end of the last concurrent start to the first mixed GC

Field.name: predictionActive
Field.label: Prediction Active
Field.description: Indicates whether the adaptive IHOP prediction is active

Event.name: PromoteObjectInNewPLAB
Event.label: Promotion in new PLAB
Event.description: Object survived scavenge and was copied to a new Promotion Local Allocation Buffer (PLAB). Supported GCs are Parallel Scavange, G1 and CMS with Parallel New. Due to promotion being done in parallel an object might be reported multiple times as the GC threads race to copy all objects.

Field.name: gcId
Field.label: GC Identifier
Field.description: Identifier signifying GC during which the object was promoted

Field.name: objectClass
Field.label: Object Class
Field.description: Class of promoted object

Field.name: objectSize
Field.label: Object Size
Field.description: Size of promoted object

Field.name: tenuringAge
Field.label: Object Tenuring Age
Field.description: Tenuring age of a surviving object before being copied. The tenuring age of an object is a value between 0-15 and is incremented each scavange the object survives. Newly allocated objects have tenuring age 0.

Field.name: tenured
Field.label: Tenured
Field.description: True if object was promoted to Old space, otherwise the object was aged and copied to a Survivor space

Field.name: plabSize
Field.label: PLAB Size
Field.description: Size of the allocated PLAB to which the object was copied

Event.name: PromoteObjectOutsidePLAB
Event.label: Promotion outside PLAB
Event.description: Object survived scavenge and was copied directly to the heap. Supported GCs are Parallel Scavange, G1 and CMS with Parallel New. Due to promotion being done in parallel an object might be reported multiple times as the GC threads race to copy all objects.

Field.name: gcId
Field.label: GC Identifier
Field.description: Identifier signifying GC during which the object was promoted

Field.name: objectClass
Field.label: Object Class
Field.description: Class of promoted object

Field.name: objectSize
Field.label: Object Size
Field.description: Size of promoted object

Field.name: tenuringAge
Field.label: Object Tenuring Age
Field.description: Tenuring age of a surviving object before being copied. The tenuring age of an object is a value between 0-15 and is incremented each scavange the object survives. Newly allocated objects have tenuring age 0.

Field.name: tenured
Field.label: Tenured
Field.description: True if object was promoted to Old space, otherwise the object was aged and copied to a Survivor space

Event.name: PromotionFailed
Event.label: Promotion Failed
Event.description: Promotion of an object failed

Event.name: EvacuationFailed
Event.label: Evacuation Failed
Event.description: Evacuation of an object failed

Event.name: ConcurrentModeFailure
Event.label: Concurrent Mode Failure
Event.description: Concurrent Mode failed

Event.name: GCPhaseParallel
Event.label: GC Phase Parallel
Event.description: GC phases for parallel workers

Event.name: G1HeapRegionTypeChange
Event.label: G1 Heap Region Type Change
Event.description: Information about a G1 heap region type change

Event.name: SafepointBegin
Event.label: Safepoint Begin
Event.description: Safepointing begin

Field.name: totalThreadCount
Field.label: Total Threads
Field.description: The total number of threads at the start of safe point

Field.name: jniCriticalThreadCount
Field.label: JNI Critical Threads
Field.description: The number of threads in JNI critical sections

Event.name: SafepointStateSynchronization
Event.label: Safepoint State Synchronization
Event.description: Synchronize run state of threads

Field.name: initialThreadCount
Field.label: Initial Threads
Field.description: The number of threads running at the beginning of state check

Field.name: runningThreadCount
Field.label: Running Threads
Field.description: The number of threads still running

Field.name: iterations
Field.label: Iterations
Field.description: Number of state check iterations

Event.name: SafepointCleanup
Event.label: Safepoint Cleanup
Event.description: Safepointing begin running cleanup tasks

Event.name: SafepointCleanupTask
Event.label: Safepoint Cleanup Task
Event.description: Safepointing begin running cleanup tasks

Field.name: name
Field.label: Task Name
Field.description: The task name

Event.name: SafepointEnd
Event.label: Safepoint End
Event.description: Safepointing end

Event.name: ExecuteVMOperation
Event.label: VM Operation
Event.description: Execution of a VM Operation

Field.name: safepoint
Field.label: At Safepoint
Field.description: If the operation occured at a safepoint

Field.name: blocking
Field.label: Caller Blocked
Field.description: If the calling thread was blocked until the operation was complete

Field.name: caller
Field.label: Caller
Field.description: Thread requesting operation. If non-blocking, will be set to 0 indicating thread is unknown

Field.name: safepointId
Field.label: Safepoint Identifier
Field.description: The safepoint (if any) under which this operation was completed

Event.name: Shutdown
Event.label: JVM Shutdown
Event.description: JVM shutting down

Field.name: reason
Field.label: Reason
Field.description: Reason for JVM shutdown

Event.name: ObjectAllocationInNewTLAB
Event.label: Allocation in new TLAB
Event.description: Allocation in new Thread Local Allocation Buffer

Field.name: objectClass
Field.label: Object Class
Field.description: Class of allocated object

Event.name: ObjectAllocationOutsideTLAB
Event.label: Allocation outside TLAB
Event.description: Allocation outside Thread Local Allocation Buffers

Field.name: objectClass
Field.label: Object Class
Field.description: Class of allocated object

Field.name: objectClass
Field.label: Object Class
Field.description: Class of allocated object

Field.name: weight
Field.label: Sample Weight
Field.description: The relative weight of the sample. Aggregating the weights for a large number of samples, for a particular class, thread or stack trace, gives a statistically accurate representation of the allocation pressure

Event.name: OldObjectSample
Event.label: Old Object Sample
Event.description: A potential memory leak

Field.name: arrayElements
Field.label: Array Elements
Field.description: If the object is an array, the number of elements, or -1 if it is not an array

Event.name: DumpReason
Event.label: Recording Reason
Event.description: Who requested the recording and why

Field.name: reason
Field.label: Reason
Field.description: Reason for writing recording data to disk

Field.name: recordingId
Field.label: Recording Id
Field.description: Id of the recording that triggered the dump, or -1 if it was not related to a recording

Event.name: DataLoss
Event.label: Data Loss
Event.description: Data could not be copied out from a buffer, typically because of contention

Field.name: amount
Field.label: Amount
Field.description: Amount lost data

Field.name: total
Field.label: Total
Field.description: Total lost amount for thread

Event.name: JVMInformation
Event.label: JVM Information
Event.description: Description of JVM and the Java application

Event.name: InitialSystemProperty
Event.label: Initial System Property
Event.description: System Property at JVM start

Event.name: CPULoad
Event.label: CPU Load
Event.description: OS CPU Load

Field.name: user
Field.label: User Mode CPU Load
Field.description: User mode thread CPU load

Field.name: system
Field.label: System Mode CPU Load
Field.description: System mode thread CPU load

Field.name: switchRate
Field.label: Switch Rate
Field.description: Number of context switches per second

Field.name: networkInterface
Field.label: Network Interface
Field.description: Network Interface Name

Field.name: readRate
Field.label: Read Rate
Field.description: Number of incoming bits per second

Field.name: writeRate
Field.label: Write Rate
Field.description: Number of outgoing bits per second

Field.name: activeCount
Field.label: Active Threads
Field.description: Number of live active threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads

Field.name: daemonCount
Field.label: Daemon Threads
Field.description: Number of live daemon threads

Field.name: accumulatedCount
Field.label: Accumulated Threads
Field.description: Number of threads created and also started since JVM start

Field.name: peakCount
Field.label: Peak Threads
Field.description: Peak live thread count since JVM start or when peak count was reset

Field.name: loadedClassCount
Field.label: Loaded Class Count
Field.description: Number of classes loaded since JVM start

Field.name: unloadedClassCount
Field.label: Unloaded Class Count
Field.description: Number of classes unloaded since JVM start

Field.name: classLoaderData
Field.label: ClassLoaderData Pointer
Field.description: Pointer to the ClassLoaderData structure in the JVM

Field.name: classCount
Field.label: Classes
Field.description: Number of loaded classes

Field.name: chunkSize
Field.label: Total Chunk Size
Field.description: Total size of all allocated metaspace chunks (each chunk has several blocks)

Field.name: blockSize
Field.label: Total Block Size
Field.description: Total size of all allocated metaspace blocks (each chunk has several blocks)

Field.name: hiddenClassCount
Field.label: Hidden Classes
Field.description: Number of hidden classes

Field.name: hiddenChunkSize
Field.label: Total Hidden Classes Chunk Size
Field.description: Total size of all allocated metaspace chunks for hidden classes (each chunk has several blocks)

Field.name: hiddenBlockSize
Field.label: Total Hidden Classes Block Size
Field.description: Total size of all allocated metaspace blocks for hidden classes (each chunk has several blocks)

Field.name: bucketCount
Field.label: Bucket Count
Field.description: Number of buckets

Field.name: entryCount
Field.label: Entry Count
Field.description: Number of all entries

Field.name: totalFootprint
Field.label: Total Footprint
Field.description: Total memory footprint (the table itself plus all of the entries)

Field.name: bucketCountMaximum
Field.label: Maximum Bucket Count
Field.description: The maximum bucket length (entries in a single bucket)

Field.name: bucketCountAverage
Field.label: Average Bucket Count
Field.description: The average bucket length

Field.name: bucketCountVariance
Field.label: Bucket Count Variance
Field.description: How far bucket lengths are spread out from their average value

Field.name: bucketCountStandardDeviation
Field.label: Bucket Count Standard Deviation
Field.description: How far bucket lengths are spread out from their mean (expected) value

Field.name: insertionRate
Field.label: Insertion Rate
Field.description: How many items were added since last event (per second)

Field.name: removalRate
Field.label: Removal Rate
Field.description: How many items were removed since last event (per second)

Field.name: baseAddress
Field.label: Base Address
Field.description: Starting address of the module

Field.name: topAddress
Field.label: Top Address
Field.description: Ending address of the module

Event.name: ModuleRequire
Event.label: Module Require
Event.description: A directed edge representing a dependency

Field.name: targetModule
Field.label: Target Module
Field.description: Module to which the package is qualifiedly exported. If null or N/A, the package is unqualifiedly exported

Event.name: G1HeapRegionInformation
Event.label: G1 Heap Region Information
Event.description: Information about a specific heap region in the G1 GC

Event.name: GCConfiguration
Event.label: GC Configuration
Event.description: The configuration of the garbage collector

Field.name: youngCollector
Field.label: Young Garbage Collector
Field.description: The garbage collector used for the young generation

Field.name: oldCollector
Field.label: Old Garbage Collector
Field.description: The garbage collector used for the old generation

Field.name: parallelGCThreads
Field.label: Parallel GC Threads
Field.description: Number of parallel threads to use for garbage collection

Field.name: concurrentGCThreads
Field.label: Concurrent GC Threads
Field.description: Number of concurrent threads to use for garbage collection

Field.name: usesDynamicGCThreads
Field.label: Uses Dynamic GC Threads
Field.description: Whether a dynamic number of GC threads are used or not

Field.name: isExplicitGCConcurrent
Field.label: Concurrent Explicit GC
Field.description: Whether System.gc() is concurrent or not

Field.name: isExplicitGCDisabled
Field.label: Disabled Explicit GC
Field.description: Whether System.gc() will cause a garbage collection or not

Field.name: pauseTarget
Field.label: Pause Target
Field.description: Target for GC pauses

Field.name: gcTimeRatio
Field.label: GC Time Ratio
Field.description: Target for runtime vs garbage collection time

Event.name: GCSurvivorConfiguration
Event.label: GC Survivor Configuration
Event.description: The configuration of the survivors of garbage collection

Field.name: maxTenuringThreshold
Field.label: Maximum Tenuring Threshold
Field.description: Upper limit for the age of how old objects to keep in the survivor area

Field.name: initialTenuringThreshold
Field.label: Initial Tenuring Threshold
Field.description: Initial age limit for how old objects to keep in survivor area

Event.name: GCTLABConfiguration
Event.label: TLAB Configuration
Event.description: The configuration of the Thread Local Allocation Buffers (TLABs)

Field.name: usesTLABs
Field.label: TLABs Used
Field.description: If Thread Local Allocation Buffers (TLABs) are in use

Event.name: GCHeapConfiguration
Event.label: GC Heap Configuration
Event.description: The configuration of the garbage collected heap

Field.name: usesCompressedOops
Field.label: If Compressed Oops Are Used
Field.description: If compressed Oops (Ordinary Object Pointers) are enabled

Field.name: compressedOopsMode
Field.label: Compressed Oops Mode
Field.description: The kind of compressed oops being used

Field.name: objectAlignment
Field.label: Object Alignment
Field.description: Object alignment (in bytes) on the heap

Field.name: heapAddressBits
Field.label: Heap Address Size
Field.description: Heap Address Size (in bits)

Event.name: YoungGenerationConfiguration
Event.label: Young Generation Configuration
Event.description: The configuration of the young generation of the garbage collected heap

Field.name: newRatio
Field.label: New Ratio
Field.description: The size of the young generation relative to the tenured generation

Event.name: ZAllocationStall
Event.label: ZGC Allocation Stall
Event.description: Time spent waiting for memory to become available

Event.name: ZPageAllocation
Event.label: ZGC Page Allocation
Event.description: Allocation of a ZPage

Event.name: ZUncommit
Event.label: ZGC Uncommit
Event.description: Uncommitting of memory

Event.name: ZUnmap
Event.label: ZGC Unmap
Event.description: Unmapping of memory

Event.name: ShenandoahHeapRegionStateChange

Event.description: Information about a Shenandoah heap region state change

Event.name: ShenandoahHeapRegionInformation
Event.label: Shenandoah Heap Region Information
Event.description: Information about a specific heap region in the Shenandoah GC

Field.name: lockCount
Field.label: Lock Count
Field.description: The number of Java threads in a critical section when the GC locker is started

Field.name: stallCount
Field.label: Stall Count
Field.description: The number of Java threads stalled by the GC locker

Field.name: networkInterface
Field.label: Network Interface
Field.description: Network Interface Name

Field.name: description
Field.label: Root Description
Field.description: Root information

Field.name: system
Field.label: System
Field.description: The subsystem of origin for the root

Field.name: type
Field.label: Type
Field.description: The root type

Field.name: size
Field.label: Array Size
Field.description: Size of array

Field.name: index
Field.label: Index
Field.description: Index in the array

Field.name: name
Field.label: Field
Field.description: Name of field

Field.name: modifiers
Field.label: Field Modifiers
Field.description: Field modifiers

Field.name: description
Field.label: Object Description
Field.description: Object description

Field.name: referrer
Field.label: Referrer Object
Field.description: Object referencing this object

Field.name: array
Field.label: Array Information
Field.description: Array or null if it is not an array

Field.name: field
Field.label: Field Information
Field.description: Field or null if it is an array

Field.name: object
Field.label: Object
Field.description: Object holder for this reference

Field.name: skip
Field.label: Skip Value
